title: Decorative Moldings
metaDescription: EPS moldings for doors, windows and walls. Light, durable and easy to install, they are ideal for decorative finishes in internal and external environments.

hero.title: Decorative Moldings
hero.description: EPS moldings for doors, windows and walls. Light, durable and easy to install, they are ideal for decorative finishes in internal and external environments.

categoryDescription: Explore our EPS moldings for doors, windows, eaves and more. Designed to add aesthetic value and functionality to your projects.

products.name: Door and Window Moldings
products.description: Moldings for door and window finishing with elegant design.

products.name: Column and Capital Moldings
products.description: Column and capital moldings with classic style.

products.name: Wall Moldings
products.description: Wall moldings with resistance and aesthetics.

benefits.title: Sophisticated Finish
benefits.description: Elegant details that enhance design and add style to any construction, from classic to contemporary.

benefits.title: Fast and Easy Installation
benefits.description: Light, they allow agile applications without the need for structural reinforcements, reducing time and costs.

benefits.title: Extended durability
benefits.description: Light, resistant and low-maintenance material, ensuring extended service life with excellent cost-effectiveness.
